parameters.name: CheckId
parameters.description:
The ID of the check item.

> You can call the [ListCheckResult](~~ListCheckResult~~) operation to query the IDs of check items.

parameters.name: CheckIds
parameters.description: List of item IDs to be checked.

parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description: The instance IDs of the assets on which risks are detected based on the check item.
